[[inst_lbu_pcr]]
==== LBU.PCR

*Syntax:* lbu.pcr [symbol], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load 8-bit unsigned byte from memory at effective address.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_lbu_pcr.svg[LBU.PCR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA
